file_content.text: Captain, we have company.
Repetition is senseless. Kill Gormak chieftains or wait months to see Biddeck-Va.
I seek Biddeck-Va.
Your kind have a sense of entitlement. It is unearned.
What business could you have with Biddeck-Va?
I require his Pendant of Bone.
He has an item I need.
His talisman? It's old but worthless.
Then he won't mind parting with it.
Good.
It possesses sentimental value.
Maybe to someone as simpleminded as you.
You know nothing.
You venture into chaos for junk.
Just tell me where Biddeck-Va is.
Reserve your comments.
Your tone could have dire consequences.
Show some respect.
I am alone here.
I mean him no harm.
I come in peace.
He is strongest. No need for fear.
Biddeck-Va wars against Gormak. He won't return until their fiercest chieftains are slain.
This campaign takes months. You will have to wait.
I wait for no one.
I'm in a hurry.
What takes Voss commandos months, I will do in minutes.
Months? Pathetic.
I offer my assistance.
Perhaps I can help.
I will wipe out Biddeck-Va's enemies myself. Then he will meet with me.
Delusion. The Gormak chieftains are fierce, well-protected.
I will show you where. Then I will not see you again.
